episode.title: Plan 9 from Outer Space (1959)
episode.description: Classic B-Movie. Aliens try to take over the world by resurrecting the dead in an effort to to prevent humans from creating a doomsday weapon which would destroy the universe.
episode.shortDescription: Classic B-Movie. Aliens try to take over the world by resurrecting the dead.
episode.mediumDescription: Classic B-Movie. Aliens try to take over the world by resurrecting the dead in an effort to to prevent humans from creating a doomsday weapon which would destroy the universe.
